Key Match Events: Tumisang Orebonye scored a second-minute strike to give Botswana a 2-0 win over Cape Verde
Pre-Game Insights: Botswana will be looking to record back-to-back wins for the first time since July 2023
Botswana will be aiming to make their second appearance at the AFCON
Post-Match Reflections: For Cape Verde, Thursday's defeat brought their quest for a third consecutive AFCON back down to earth
Miscellaneous Highlights: Botswana currently 147th in the latest FIFA World Ranking
Cape Verde go into Tuesday's clash on the back of four defeats in their last six matches in all competitions
